scene:
The Shinra Building
Arrival at Shinra Headquarters The 60th Floor The 61st Floor: Lounge The 62nd Floor: Mayor's Office + Shinra Library The 63rd Floor: Coupon Exchange The 64th Floor: Gym The 65th Floor: Model of Midgar The 66th Floor: Conference Hall The 67th Floor: Hojo's Lab Captivity A Trail of Blood Escaping the Shinra Building
Cloud, Tifa, and Barret stand before Shinra Headquarters. BarretHey, you oughta know this building well. Cloud...Not really, now that I think about it,This's the first time I've ever been to the Headquarters. BarretI heard about this place before.Every floor above the 60th is special and not easy to get to even for employees.Must be where they took Aerith.The security's pretty light now. Awright, let's go!! TifaWait a second! You're not thinking of just going right through the main entrance, are you? BarretWell what else does it look like!? I'm gonna kick some Shinra butt and...... TifaThat's not going to work! We've got to find another way... BarretAin't gonna be no other way! If we keep wastin' time like this, Aerith'll... TifaI know that! But if we get caught here...Hey, Cloud. ...What should we do? Cloud- Let's bust on in!- Let's sneak in quietly
Let's bust on in! BarretThat's more like it! C'mon, let's go!! They run inside. ReceptionistExcuse me! If you don't have an appointment, you'll just have to... BarretDon't need no appointment... This is a 'mergency!Anyone who don't wanna get their face bashed in better git outta the way!! He aims his gun-arm at the receptionist. ReceptionistYaagghh! SoldiersWho do they think they are?Y, You don't think that's AVALANCHE?Intruders! Seize them!! Everyone else flees as the soldiers run to fight Cloud and the others, who defeat them with ease. BarretLet's go to the top! They run up a staircase to the second floor. There is a bulletin board there with flyers. BulletinShinra, Inc. This week's phraseShinra's Future Is The World's Future!!Mako Energy For A Brighter World!! FlyerTurtle's Paradise Newsletter No. 2The end of another hard day. Wouldn't you like to sit back with a tall cool one?You can at the Turtles Paradise!! Stop in today!There's nothing like a smooth one after work! There's a shop nearby, and a couple is looking at a car advertisement on a television screen. WomanHoney...... Buy me that car! ManBut baby, that's way too expensive. WomanWhat did you say? They notice Cloud and the others. Man + Woman......... They flee. Hh, hey!Ww, wait for meeeeeeee............! ShopkeeperWelcome. Today we have on special...Eagghhh!!Here, t, take the money... BarretDon't want no money. AVALANCHE ain't no packa criminals.We jes want back what your boss stole from us. ShopkeeperA, AVALANCHE? BarretNow we ain't gonna hurt you. Might even pay ya, if ya help us. ShopkeeperOk... ok... well...Thank you and come again... Forget I said that... If they try to open the treasure chests... ShopkeeperYou opened up all those things without asking and, hey wait! Cloud and the others leave and get on an elevator. Tifa......What's wrong? CloudI didn't want to start a ruckus till we saved Aerith.I should have known that was impossible though... BarretHeh, heh, heh. CloudWhat is it? You're givin' me the willies. BarretSo there are times when even you fight for other people. I am impressed. CloudWho cares if you're impressed...? BarretY'know, I ain't so good at sayin' this, but... Sorry... for lotsa things. A red light starts flashing and alarms go off. BarretWh, what the!? TifaLook! The numbers on the elevator are all scrambling. BarretDA-MN...!I don't care where, Cloud! Just stop it! TifaWhat's going on!? The elevator stops four times before finally reaching the 59th floor. On some of the floors, instead of fighting Shinra soldiers, a Shinra employee may attempt to get on the elevator. Shinra EmployeeOh man!!No, uh, that's all right. My mistake. I'm, uh, not getting on.Oh man!! [on to the 59th floor]
Let's sneak in quietly TifaSee? Let's be careful and find a different route! They enter through a side entrance and start climbing the stairs. BarretYo! You really gonna take these stairs all the way up? TifaWell, we've got to get to Aerith to help her somehow. BarretTalk about out of the way... TifaI don't have time to argue with you. I'm going! BarretY, yo, Tifa! Don't go off by yourself... Barret and Cloud follow Tifa up the stairs. BarretDon't know... Why... the hell... We gotta... climb... Cloud...Because we don't want to start a commotion until we've saved Aerith.I doubt that's possible though... Barret...heh heh heh. CloudKnock it off. You're giving me the creeps. BarretSo even you will fight for someone else. I had you figured wrong I guess. CloudWho cares what you figured! BarretI'm just sayin' mebbe I was wrong... Tifaheh heh heh...... CloudWhat's that supposed to mean, Tifa? Barret...how much farther do these stairs go on? TifaWhy don't you ask them? BarretIt's not one of them endless stairways or somethin', d'ya think? TifaOf course not!! BarretRight... couldn't be that...Are we there yet? TifaNot yet. Barret...there yet? TifaI said not yet! BarretYo... TifaLook, don't even ask! We're way way way way far away from being there yet, ok!? Finally Barret stops, panting. BarretDamn, man! I've had it! I'm going back! TifaAnd take just as long going down as you did coming up? Barret............ TifaC'mon, Barret. Pull it together! BarretYeah, well all I know is I'm just flesh 'n' blood... 'cept for this arm of mine.Don't treat me like I'm some ex-member of SOLDIER or somethin'...... TifaWhat about me!? I'm human too! Oh, do what you want, I'm going on! She turns to continue up the stairs, then stops. ......? She pulls her skirt down. Yaah! Barret! You go first! BarretWhat're ya ignorant? I didn't mean that... TifaAll right, all right!Cloud, you go on ahead too!! They continue on... BarretYo... What floor is this? Tifa...I gave up counting. BarretWhy they gotta build these buildings so damn tall?That Shinra... They're just no damn good. Tifa......... Barrethuff... Man, I'm beat...Marlene, Daddy wanted to see your face one more time... TifaWould you stop acting like a retard and climb!?It's just a bit more!...maybe. They finally reach the top and stop, panting. BarretF...finally... M... made it...N... never wanna see... no more stairs the rest of my life... Tifahuff... puff... this really takes it out of you...But this is it. We'd better get ready...! They all walk through the exit to the 59th floor.
If Cloud tries to go back down... BarretHey Cloud!You come all this way, you thinkin' of goin' back down to the 1st floor? Cloud- Yeah- No......
Yeah BarretThis ain't no time for fooling around!
No...... BarretYeah, that's right! Let's go on then!
Some soldiers are standing by the next set of elevators. SoldiersDestroy the intruders! Cloud and the others fight off the soldiers, one of whom drops something. CloudWhat's this? Received Key Item "Keycard 60"! They take the elevator up to the 60th floor. TifaI hope Aerith is all right. BarretThis is the real thing. Don't let your guard down. The Shinra employee meant to be watching the cameras is asleep on duty, so he doesn't see Cloud as he steps out of the elevator onto the 60th floor. There are a collection of bust statues here with guards on patrol. GuardWhat're you doing here!? No unauthorized people are allowed here!! Guard 2People like you don't belong here! Go on, get out! BarretLookit that, all them guards is runnin' around.Cloud, you go on ahead and signal us when it's safe to come.When those guards turn around, MOVE! TifaStay in the shadows!
If Cloud messes up... GuardHey there! What do you think you're doing there!? Cloud and the others fight off the guards. BarretWhat the hell're ya doin'? Come on gotta do it again! If Cloud messes up four times they end up taking out all the guards. BarretI shoulda known it'd turn out like this...If I'd known it'd be like this in the first place... TifaShhh! Now let's move on.
If they make it past the guards successfully... BarretOk! We gonna rock! TifaRemember, we're here to save Aerith. BarretHell, I know that!
They continue on to the 61st floor, the door to which is stuck open so they can get through without a keycard. It is a lounge area with a huge tree in the center and a number of employees milling around. WomanI don't remember seeing your face before... You new here?Say, you're cute. Let me teach you some... things. Cloud- Things?- Um, I'm kinda in a hurry...
Things? WomanWipe that stupid look off your face. I was only going to teach you how to get to the next floor.The higher ups in the company use the floors above the 60th floor. But you can't get there without a keycard.Get a keycard and you can use the elevators freely. Ding. ...voila! You hear that sound and the door opens.Just remember there are different types of cards. One keycard alone won't let you go everywhere.For example,'Keycard 60' only takes you to the 60th floor. 'Keycard 65' only takes you to the 65th floor.It's a security system worthy of Shinra. After all, all the power in Midgar and the world, for that matter, is controlled by them.Oh, I have to go. Gotta get back to work!
Um, I'm kinda in a hurry... WomanOh? That's too bad...
ManThis is the lounge floor. Above us are the special floors for the big wigs in the company.It's tough working under someone. Tires you out. Man 2What's keeping her? Did she forget her keycard?Even employees can't walk around above the 60th floor without a keycard. Man 3The hell are you? What're you doin' around here? Cloud- Where's Aerith?- ......
Where's Aerith? Man 3Aerith? How did you know that name? You must be...!?Aerith, you mean that kid. The receptionist. Yeah, I was startin' to worry 'bout her myself.And so another rival appears on the scene, eh?You mean, she's not? It's someone else?
...... Man 3Oh, I see. So you must be that whatcha call it...Shinra, Inc. Repair Division!!You know, it looks like this building is starting to fall apart.This door was just pushed open. You ought to fix this right away.Oh yeah, and take a look on the other floors too. I'll give you this. Received Key Item "Keycard 62"! Man 3This door is stuck wide open. Better fix this right away.
Woman Sitting DownI thought I heard a ruckus downstairs a minute ago. Do you know what that was all about? Man Sitting DownNo idea. But no need to worry because everything above the 60th floor is safe. Having obtained the next keycard, they continue on to the 62nd floor, which houses several different libraries. They find a man waiting outside someone's office. HartHow do you do?This is the Midgar Mayor's Office. Mayor Domino is in his office.I am the Deputy Mayor. If you should have any questions feel free to ask me... DominoHmm? Oh, and who might you be?You all must be those... ahem... Me? I'm Domino, the Mayor of Midgar.Actually, I'm Mayor in name only. The city and everything in it is really run by Shinra, Inc.My only real job is watching over Shinra's documents...Me! The Mayor! A librarian! Ohh......You want to get upstairs? I tell you what, if you can guess the password, I'll give you my keycard.Yes, that's it. Guess the password and I'll give you my keycard!Get it on the first try and I'll even throw in a special item! HartDid you speak with the Mayor?What? A password? Oh, I get it...He's got way too much time on his hands. But you can't really blame him, Everything in Midgar is controlled by President Shinra.Maybe I can help you.What do you want to know? Cloud- HELP- Forget it
HELP HartSure, sure. All right.As a public servant, it's my job to serve the needs of the people.So here's a hint......for 500 gil. Cloud- Give him the money- Forget it! HartOh, my... well, Thank you very much.Now listen. On this floor are four research libraries for four different sections of Shinra, Inc. ...Parts of the password are hidden in each of the libraries.Pay careful attention to the files in each room.The name of each library is written on the plaque outside the door.What can I do for you? Cloud- Give me the hint again- Give me the next hint- Uh, nothing HartSure, sure. All right.As a public servant, it's my job to serve the needs of the people. So here's a hint......for 1000 gil. Cloud- Give him the money- Forget it! HartOh, my... well, Thank you very much.Now, in each library will be one file mixed in from another library.Look carefully at the numbers on each file.What can I do for you? Cloud- Give me the hint again- Give me the next hint- Uh, nothing HartSure, sure. All right.As a public servant, it's my job to serve the needs of the people.So here's a hint......for 2000 gil. Cloud- Give him the money- Forget it! HartOh, my... well, Thank you very much.There is a number at the beginning of each file name.Of course there's a number even on the files that don't belong in that library.Match the number with the letters in the title of the file.If the file starts with a 4, then check the fourth letter and... well, you get the idea.
Forget it Hart...I see. Then, I guess that's that.Good luck finding it on your own.If you still can't find it. I'll just be right over here. Ready to tell you anytime...
The placement of the books and the numbers vary each time, but below are the titles in their correct libraries without numbers. In each library there is also a television screen displaying a notice. [Shinra, Inc. Urban Dev. Research Library]Reactor construction chartProblems with Plate construction in MidgarNew plans for Urban PlanningMidgar City map: Sectors 0-4Midgar City map: Sectors 5-8An illustrated guide to City Planning Materials are non-circulating!It is forbidden to remove any materials from this floor. [Shinra, Inc. Scientific Research Library]Biological characteristics of the AncientsData on experimental animals living near MidgarThe Jenova ProjectThe Ancients in HistoryFile on Dr. Gast, BiologistFinal evolutionary stages in land dwelling life This is the Scientific Research Library.Materials for the...Urban Dev. LibraryPeace/Weapon Dev. LibrarySpace Dev. Libraryare held in their respective libraries... [Shinra, Inc. Space Dev. Research Library]Diminishing Mako energy and Planet movementsModern history of Midgar space program vol. 1Modern history of Midgar space program vol. 2Results of failed space mission "YA-79"Economic report: Space Dev ProgramShinra rocket space travel This is the Space Dev Research Library.Click on the plate in front of each library to see what it is. [Shinra, Inc. Peace Preservation/Weapon Dev. Research Library]Special peace keeping lawMateria production and its military usesRanks and extended use of Mako weaponryHeidegger's Shinra peace keeping lawPlan for new land weaponsEconomic report: anti-Shinra activities This is the Public Order/Weapon Development Library.Return materials where you found them. Do not mix materials from other libraries. After obtaining the password, Cloud returns to Domino's office. DominoGot it?Then tell me.So, what's the password? Cloud- BEST- KING- ORBS- BOMB- MAKO- HOJO- Wait a second
If Cloud guesses it right the first time, Domino will say any of the following depending on the password. (ORBS and HOJO are never the password.) DominoBEST!!God, I love the sound of that! BEST!! I AM the best... ME!! No matter what anyone else says, you'd better believe it.KING!!God, I love the sound of that! KING!! President Shinra sucks! I should be King of Midgar!BOMB!!God, I love the sound of that! BOMB!! I'm so angry, I'm like a walking time bomb waiting to explode!MAKO!!God, I love the sound of that! MAKO! If I had a lot more of it, I would be a real Mayor! Domino......hmm. Well, ok. Here, take it. Received "Keycard 65"! DominoI never thought you'd get it on the first try...Just goes to show you can't judge a book by its cover. Oh well, a promise is a promise. Take this, too. Received "Elemental" Materia!
If Cloud guesses wrong... DominoNope! You're ALL wrong! It's a much better word than that! Try again!
If Cloud guesses right the second time, Domino goes through one of his WORD!! exclamations, hands over the keycard, and then... Domino......hmm. Well, ok. Here, take it.Hmm. It appears you're not completely stupid.Fine then, take this. Received "Elixir"!
If Cloud guesses wrong the second time, too, Domino doesn't give him anything extra whenever he finally gets it right.
DominoWhy would I do something like this, you ask?To mess with them, of course! Shinra's been torturing me forever.That's why I was a little rough on you all just now. Now go up there and really make them suffer.This ought to make us even! Heh heh heh......But my card will only get you to the 65th floor.Can you believe how they treat me? ...ME! Like some common employee... HartIf you run into President Shinra please don't tell him about this.I can't be a partner to anymore trouble for Shinra. Having obtained Domino's keycard, Cloud and the others continue on to the 63rd floor, which is a maze of small storage rooms with locked doors. Near the escalators is a room with a computer. Computer...bing... bing... Enter command Cloud- All clear- Coupon Change
All clear Computer......bing... bing... Start again from the beginning?The information and materials you received on this floor will all be cleared.Clear them? Cloud- Yeah......- No Computer...... ......... ......... Cleared.You are permitted to open any door on this floor up to three times.
Coupon Change Computer...beep......beep...... You do not have any coupons.
There is an air duct next to the computer. CloudAn air-duct... It doesn't look like I'll be able to climb in here. The ducts can, however, be reached from some of the other rooms. By using the air ducts and the three doors, Cloud can manage to get all three coupons and return to the computer. Computer...bing... bing... Enter command Cloud- All clear- Coupon Change
All clear Computer......bing... bing... Start again from the beginning?The information and materials you received on this floor will all be cleared.Clear them? Cloud- Yeah......- No Computer...... ......... ......... Cleared.You are permitted to open any door on this floor up to three times.
Coupon Change ComputerYou can exchange your coupons for items. Here are the items you can have...A coupon.........'Star Pendant'B coupon.........'Four Slots'C coupon.........'All' MateriaPlease use caution... once you have exchanged coupons for items you may not use 'All Clear' function.Exchange coupon? Cloud- Yeah......- Naw Computer...... ......... ...... Coupon exchange complete. Received "Star Pendant"! Received "Four Slot"! Received "All Materia"!
Cloud and the others move on to the 64th floor. Here, they find an exercise room, a nap room, and a locker room. ReceptionistYou must be a visitor. Please feel free to use any unused machines. Woman on Treadmill...huff... puff... If you're tired, you should get some rest in the next room. Man on Treadmill...huff... weeze... I'm starting to worry about my belly...... Man Lifting WeightsHmph, hmph... Since I'm head of security for this building, stamina's very important to me. Vending MachineTake one to restore your energy!! 'Shinra Gym Special Drink'Only 250 gil!!- Try it out- Don't try it
Try it out Cloud...Nothing...
Don't try it Nothing happens.
Man in Nap Room...zzz... Please...... let me...... get some... rest...... Sign in BathroomOut of OrderPlease use a different FloorShinra Company Repair Management Department In the locker room, some of the lockers are unlocked. CloudWhat is this...... a Megaphone?Hanging on to this won't do any good... They move on to the 65th floor, where there is a model of Midgar in a central room, and treasure chests placed around in side rooms. CloudA model of Midgar... born from Mako sucked right out of the earth.Parts of the model are missing...- Place the Midgar parts- Leave it alone Cloud...Sounds like something opened up... Placing all the parts in the model opens up the treasure chest with Keycard 66 in it. Cloud and the others move on to the 66th floor, which is dominated by a large conference room. Several offices and a bathroom take up the remaining space. SecretaryWhew, I'm so sick of carrying all these files...But I get to meet lots of guys. I guess that's the benefit of being a secretary! If Cloud speaks to her after she enters one of the offices... SecretaryHello!! (He's kinda cute. But looks like that girl's with him... But that's kinda exciting!) ManIs it just me or does the Conference Room smell? There's some sort of stench coming from somewhere... Man 2................................................................................................................................................Phew! Man 3Hey, when you're in the bathroom, do you ever hear whispers coming from somewhere? Man 4They're having another executive meeting. I wonder if it's about that Plate incident. Man 5It gives me the feeling that I AM alive. The feeling of moving this world, just with my hands. WomanCome on, we're building the future of Mako! Cloud enters a stall in the bathroom. Above it is a vent. Cloud- Flush?- Climb up?- Get out of here Cloud climbs up and enters the duct system, the others following. He, Barret, and Tifa peer down through the next vent at the conference room below, where Shinra's executives are having a meeting. BarretGeez--! That's a lotta suits! ReeveWe have the damage estimates for Sector 7.Considering those factories we already set up and all the investments, the damage is estimated at approximately 10 Billion gil...The estimated cost to rebuild Sector 7 is... President ShinraWe're not rebuilding. ReeveWhat? President ShinraWe're leaving Sector 7 as it is.And restarting the Neo-Midgar plan. Reeve...then the Ancients? President ShinraThe Promised Land will soon be ours.I want you to raise the Mako rates 15% in every area. PalmerRate hike! Rate hike! Tra, la, la! And please include our Space Program in the budget! President ShinraReeve and Scarlet will divide the extra income from the rate increase. PalmerOh man! ReeveSir. If you raise the rates, the people will lose confidence... President ShinraIt'll be all right.The ignorant citizens won't lose confidence, they'll trust Shinra, Inc. even more. HeideggerHa ha ha!After all, we're the ones who saved Sector 7 from AVALANCHE! BarretThat dirty #$*$^ President ShinraHojo. How's the girl? HojoAs a specimen, she is inferior to her mother. I'm still in the process of comparing her to her mother, Ifalna, but for now the difference is 18%. President ShinraHow long will the research take? HojoProbably 120 years. It's probably impossible to finish in our lifetime. Or in the lifetime of the specimen too, for that matter.That's why we're thinking of breeding her. Then we could create one that could withstand our research for a long time. President ShinraWhat about the Promised Land? Won't it hinder our plans? HojoThat's why I need to plan. The mother is strong... and yet has her weaknesses. He starts giggling. President ShinraThat concludes our meeting. They all get up and head for the door. Scarlet pauses to look up. ScarletSomething stinks... She, too, walks out. CloudThey were talking about Aerith... right? BarretI dunno. TifaProbably. CloudLet's follow 'em. They climb back out of the ventilation shaft and into the bathroom. Hojo has fallen behind the others in leaving the conference room, and they follow him at a distance. They stop to wait for him to reach the top of the escalator before entering the stairwell after him. CloudHojo... huh...? They follow Hojo up before the door can lock after him, thereby reaching the 67th floor. Here sprawls the lower floor of Hojo's laboratory. The three pause by the escalator. BarretI remember him.That Hojo guy. He's in charge of the Shinra's Science Department. Cloud, don't you know him? CloudThis is the first time I've actually ever seen him. So... that's what he looks like... They continue on. ManLet's see... The specimen Hojo asked me for is... Cloud and the others head down the hall and enter the lab, in the center of which is a glass chamber holding a lion-like creature. Someone is coming, so they hide behind some crates. ManIs this today's specimen? HojoYes. We're starting right away. Raise it to the upper level. The man walks away, and Hojo leans forward to touch the glass. HojoMy precious specimen... He turns and leaves. Tifa walks up to the glass. TifaPrecious specimen...?Is it going to be used for a biological experiment? Cloud suddenly takes notice of a chamber to his right, and looks through the window. CloudJenova... He clutches his head in pain and collapses. Tifa runs over as he gets up. CloudJenova... Sephiroth's... So... they've brought it here. TifaCloud, be strong! CloudDid you see it? BarretSee what? CloudIt's moving...... still alive? Barret looks inside. BarretWhere's its $#&*&@ head? This whole thing's stupid. Let's keep goin'. They go upstairs to find Hojo standing before a corresponding glass chamber directly above the other, inside of which is Aerith. CloudAerith! HojoAerith? Oh, is that her name? What do you want? CloudWe're taking Aerith back. HojoOutsiders...... BarretShoulda noticed it earlier, you... HojoThere's so many frivolous things in this world. Barret runs over and aims his gun-arm at Hojo. HojoAre you going to kill me? I don't think you should.The equipment here is extremely delicate. Without me, who could operate it? Hmm? CloudUgh. HojoThat's right. I recommend you think things out logically before you make any rash moves.Now, bring in the Specimen! The elevator within the glass chamber raises, bringing the lion-creature up to join Aerith. It starts growling at her and she runs away to pound on the glass. AerithCloud, help! CloudWhat do you think you're doin'? HojoLending a helping hand to an endangered species... Both of them are on the brink of extinction...If I don't help, all these animals will disappear. Tifa...animal? That's terrible! Aerith is a human being! BarretYou're gonna pay! CloudBarret! Can't you do anything? BarretAwright!! Step back! HojoStop!! Barret fires at the glass chamber, and it starts glowing brightly. Hojo moves closer to the door. HojoWh... what are you do-- Oh! My precious specimens... The door opens and the lion-creature jumps out, pouncing on Hojo. CloudNow's our chance to get Aerith! He runs inside the chamber. AerithThanks, Cloud. She runs out. Cloud starts to follow, but stops and turns around. TifaCloud... what's wrong? Cloud...The elevator is moving. HojoThis is no ordinary specimen. This is a very ferocious specimen! The lion creature looks up from attacking Hojo to address them. RedHe's rather strong. I'll help you all out. TifaIt talked!? RedI'll talk as much as you want later, Miss. CloudWe'll take care of that monster.Somebody take Aerith somewhere safe...- Tifa, I'm countin' on you!- Barret, take care of her! Aerith runs out with either Tifa or Barret. CloudWhat's your name? RedHojo has named me, Red XIII. A name with no meaning whatsoever to me. Call me whatever you wish. CloudCome on! They dispatch Hojo's specimen, and Aerith rejoins the group. CloudAerith, you all right? TifaShe seems all right, ...in many ways. Red XIIII have a right to choose, too. I don't like two-legged things. BarretWhat are you? Red XIIIAn informed question. But difficult to answer. I am what you see....You must have many questions, but first, let's get out of here. I'll lead the way. AerithCloud... so you did come for me. Red XIIII apologize for what happened back there. I was merely acting to throw Hojo off guard...... BarretNow we've saved Aerith, ain't no need to be in this buildin'! So let's get the hell outta here! CloudIf all five of us go together, we'll be noticed. Let's break up into two groups. Whoever he doesn't choose to come with him says goodbye:
BarretLater! Meet up at the 66th Floor Elevator! AerithI'll see you later!! We'll be waiting at the 66th Floor Elevator. TifaWe'll be going first! Meet at the 66th Floor Elevator. Red XIIIDon't be late. Do you know where the Elevator is? The 66th Floor!
The other group leaves. ManNo! Please don't kill me. I only did what Hojo told me to do.To prove it to you... here, this is the key card to the 68th Floor. Would I be doing this if I was the enemy?Received Key Item "Keycard 68"! The man then flees. If Cloud attempts to go anywhere but the elevator...
BarretWhere you goin'? Everyone's waitin' at the 66th Floor Elevator. AerithNot that way! Everyone's on the 66th Floor Elevator. TifaWhere are you going? Everyone's waiting for us at the 66th Floor Elevator.
Cloud and the others get on the 66th floor elevator. Rude of the Turks enters behind them. CloudH, hey! What is it? RudeWould you press 'Up' please? CloudTurks? Must be a trap... Rude steps aside and Tseng enters. TsengIt must have been a real thrill for you... Did you enjoy it? CloudGgh... The Turks take them up to the 70th floor, where they find the others also taken captive. Aerith is missing, though. CloudYou all got caught, too?Where is Aerith!? President ShinraIn a safe place.She's the last surviving Ancient...Don't you know? They called themselves the Cetra, and lived thousands of years ago. Now they are just a forgotten page in history. Red XIIICetra... That girl, is she a survivor of the Cetra? President ShinraCetra, or the Ancients will show us the way to the 'Promised Land.' I'm expecting a lot out of her. Red XIIIThe Promised Land? Isn't that just a legend? President ShinraEven so, it's just too appealing to not to pursue.It's been said the Promised Land is very fertile....If the land is fertile... BarretThen there's gotta be Mako! President ShinraExactly. That is why our money sucking Mako Reactor is necessary.The abundant Mako will just come out on its own.That is where Neo-Midgar will be built. Shinra's new glory... Barret@$#*^%! Quit dreamin'! President ShinraOh really, don't you know? These days all it takes for your dreams to come true is money and power.Well, that is all for our meeting. RudeCome on! Outta his way! Cloud, Tifa, and Red XIII turn away without protest, but Barret hangs back. BarretHold it! I got a lot I wanna say to you! He starts towards President Shinra, but Rude drags him away. President ShinraIf you need something else... talk to my secretary. The scene changes to the detainment area, where they've been placed in cells. Cloud with Tifa, Barret with Red XIII, and Aerith by herself. TifaPsst (Can we get out?) Cloud- (Leave it to me)- (Kinda hard)
